_header: Sith of right thou mayest not forsake
Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, carols to
_description: James Ryman, An orison to the Virgin Mary — six quatrains (aaab) and burden (bb): ‘O virgo summe decora / Pro nobis cristum exora’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Sith of Right thou mayst not forsakeMankyende the whiche thy sonne
                    hath take…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…To here oure moone and graunte oure boonePro nobis
                        christum exora

Zupitza,  Julius,

         89 (1892): 167-338: 179-80.

            1977: 146; 1977, 129-30.
